Literature.Title: D- and N-Methyl Amino Acids for Modulating the Therapeutic Properties of Antimicrobial Peptides and Lipopeptides
Literature.Author: Humpola MV, Spinelli R, Erben M, Perdomo V, Tonarelli GG, Albericio F, Siano A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=200 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>400 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus BSF FBCB1313(MIC=10.0µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=40µM),Candida albicans PEEC 2(MIC=80.2µM),Candida tropicalis DBFIQ 3(MIC=80.2µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=86.56±7.35µM)
